# ------------------------------------------------------------------------- # # Purpose : # This automake Makefile may be used to compile and link a runtime # loaded sharable object from a Verilog module. # # It has been generated by %(/simulator/fullname) from the verilog file # %(/filename) using the xyceMakefile.am.xml template. # # To function properly, the directory containing this Makefile.am and the # verilog source code for the model should be placed under the main Xyce # source tree. The "AC_CONFIG_FILES" list in configure.ac must be updated # to include this directory's "Makefile", and the "bootstrap" script rerun. # # Once these modifications to the build system are performed, "configure" # executed in a build directory will create a subdirectory for this model, # in which "make plugin" and "make install-plugin" will work.
AM_CPPFLAGS = @Xyce_INCS@ lib_LTLIBRARIES = lib$nameSpace.la BUILT_SOURCES=$bootstrapname.C plugin: lib$nameSpace.la install-plugin: install
$classname.C $classname.h: \$(srcdir)/%(/filename) admsXml -x -e \$(top_srcdir)/utils/ADMS/adms.implicit.xml -e \$(top_srcdir)/utils/ADMS/xyceVersion_nosac.xml -e \$(top_srcdir)/utils/ADMS/xyceBasicTemplates_nosac.xml -e \$(top_srcdir)/utils/ADMS/xyceAnalogFunction_nosac.xml -e \$(top_srcdir)/utils/ADMS/xyceHeaderFile_nosac.xml -e \$(top_srcdir)/utils/ADMS/xyceImplementationFile_nosac.xml \$(srcdir)/%(/filename)
$bootstrapname.C: \$(srcdir)/%(/filename) admsXml -x -e \$(top_srcdir)/utils/ADMS/adms.implicit.xml -e \$(top_srcdir)/utils/ADMS/xyceVersion_nosac.xml -e \$(top_srcdir)/utils/ADMS/xyceBasicTemplates_nosac.xml -e \$(top_srcdir)/utils/ADMS/xyceBootstrapFile.xml \$(srcdir)/%(/filename)
$bootstrapname.lo: $classname.h
CLEANFILES=$classname.C $classname.h $bootstrapname.C
lib%($nameSpace)_la_SOURCES = $classname.C \$(BUILT_SOURCES)
